name: Pineapple Shot - Cool Addiction Games
description:
Pineapple Shot is an endless mind breaker shooting arcade gameplay where you need to try and shoot all the pineapple with perfect timing

◆ Tap to shoot with knife
◆ More than 8 different knife to be unlocked
◆ Hit with perfect timing
◆ Funny play

How many pineapples can you hit? Enjoy with your friends.
